
An intern left half the RSA private key on a sticky note. The encrypted flag is 2953417024547739468782321604953237651778322322557496429784364250421520883294705014997379852819658010560255837589873400456409271135916539060872276511256002. Recover the private key and decrypt the message!

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{hwx0y1zq}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 2953417024547739468782321604953237651778322322557496429784364250421520883294705014997379852819658010560255837589873400456409271135916539060872276511256002
vulnerability: partial key exposure
hint: A partial exposure of a prime number's bits can significantly weaken RSA security. Look into lattice-based techniques like Coppersmith's attack.
